main.text: Съешь ещё этих мягких французских булок, да выпей чаю

block1.title: Unified Collaboration & Clarity
block1.text: Unified documentation for clear analytics event definitions and seamless communication between developers, managers, and analytics experts.

block2.title: Multi-Platform Standardization
block2.text: Unified source for consistent event definitions across diverse platforms, ensuring coherence and consistency in analytics data.

block3.title: Efficient Code Generation & History Tracking
block3.text: Streamlined code creation and comprehensive historical documentation for error-free analytics event deployment and evolution tracing.

card1.title: Starter
card1.text: Entry-level access to our platform for individuals looking to design and maintain their tracking plans independently.

card2.title: Team
card2.text: Empower collaborative work with advanced features enabling teamwork, approval processes, and broader publishing integrations.

card3.title: Enterprise
card3.text: Tailored solutions for organizations in need of heightened security, increased control, and dedicated support.

items.title: Lorem ipsum
items.text: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like)
